name: Voxel Planet
description:
An attempt to make a minecraft-like voxel world in Unity. There isn't much to do, but you can walk around and build some cute houses 😄

Controls

  • Move with WASD and look around with the mouse.
  • Space to jump.
  • Left click to remove blocks and right click to place them.
  • Select a block type with the number keys or the mouse wheel.
  • Press F to take a screenshot!

If you want to see more projects, don't forget to follow me on Twitter :)
